metadata.title: Analytical Jet-turning a Corner Model of the Aleutian North Slope Current and Bering Sea Current.

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: This is an analytic model of geostrophic currents and topographically forced to turn a corner confined by a lateral sidewall. A model to investigate spatial and temporal scales of kinematics for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".
metadata.notes:
Purpose: A model to investigate spatial and temporal scales of kinematics for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".

Status: Planned
